subject: Athletics and Sports
Coaches and Managers
Basketball
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: After an off-season makeover highlighted by the acquisition of Cappie Pondexter, the Liberty tips off its schedule Sunday and is talking up its hopes for championship No. 1 in season No. 14.
snippet: After an off-season makeover highlighted by the acquisition of Cappie Pondexter, the Liberty tips off its schedule Sunday and is talking up its hopes for championship No. 1 in season No. 14.
